```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
census_regions <- read.csv("censusRegions.csv")
state_abb <- read.csv("state_abb_codes.csv")
opioid_death <- read.csv("state_Opioid_Deaths2019.csv")
```

```{r}
opiod_death <- opioid_death %>%
  rename(State = "Location")
```

```{r}
merge1 <- merge(opiod_death, state_abb, by.x="State", by.y="State")
merge1 <- merge1 %>%
  select("Range.Category", "Age.adjusted.Rate", "Number.of.Deaths", "Code") %>%
  rename(State = "Code")

```

```{r}
Opioid_region <- merge(merge1, census_regions, by.x="State", by.y="State") %>%
  select("Age.adjusted.Rate", "Region") %>%
  group_by(Region) %>%
  summarize(mean_AAR = mean(Age.adjusted.Rate),
            sd_AAR = sd(Age.adjusted.Rate),
            CoD_AAR = sd_AAR/mean_AAR) 
```
